channel.title: Healthcare on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Healthcare on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: AgentRxiv: Towards Collaborative Autonomous Research
item.description: AgentRxiv enables collaborative autonomous research via LLM agent preprint sharing, boosting performance and discovery.

item.title: PathoHR: Breast Cancer Survival Prediction on High-Resolution Pathological Images
item.description: PathoHR: Boost breast cancer survival prediction with high-resolution pathology images!

item.title: MedAgent-Pro: Towards Multi-modal Evidence-based Medical Diagnosis via Reasoning Agentic Workflow
item.description: MedAgent-Pro: An evidence-based reasoning agentic system for reliable multi-modal medical diagnosis.

item.title: AIMI: Leveraging Future Knowledge and Personalization in Sparse Event Forecasting for Treatment Adherence
item.description: AIMI: A system leveraging future knowledge & personalized data for accurate treatment adherence forecasting, paving the way for timely mobile interventions.

item.title: MedAgentsBench: Benchmarking Thinking Models and Agent Frameworks for Complex Medical Reasoning
item.description: MEDAGENTSBENCH: a new benchmark for assessing complex medical reasoning in LLMs, revealing performance gaps and cost-effective strategies.

item.title: Multi Agent based Medical Assistant for Edge Devices
item.description: On-device multi-agent system overcomes privacy/latency issues in healthcare, enabling personalized, scalable AI assistance.

item.title: SPIDER: A Comprehensive Multi-Organ Supervised Pathology Dataset and Baseline Models
item.description: SPIDER: A comprehensive pathology dataset boosts AI diagnostic models.

item.title: RuCCoD: Towards Automated ICD Coding in Russian
item.description: New dataset for automated ICD coding in Russian enhances clinical data accuracy.

item.title: Current Pathology Foundation Models are unrobust to Medical Center Differences
item.description: Current pathology foundation models struggle with center variations; this paper introduces a robustness index to quantify this, revealing model biases and advancing robust model development.
